name: Momenta
description:
Arrow keys to move around.

This game was made in Gamemaker Studio 2. I have some experience in coding, but none in making a game, so I learned a ton of stuff while making this! It's not polished and has little gameplay, but I'm still pretty proud of it!

Since I used the trial version of Gamemaker Studio, I don't think the download will work. Here's a video demonstration: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i3SZK1W7SEw&feature=youtu.be

There were a few components I wanted to add if I had more time, like:

  • Boosting (code written, no gameplay yet)
  • Teleporter animations
  • Sound effects
  • Lighting
  • Glow around the player
  • Better optimization
  • More levels!

Resources used:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=izNXbMdu348 and other videos in the playlist

https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&url=https%3A%2F%2Fnohat.cc%2Ff%2Fblue-cavern-bac... for the background picture

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EsLKHMNL07k&list=PLFW7HJ_xvmRcIZNiJVLY_dm1KrfFVRPfa&index=22 for the background song
